name: POLAR ECLIPSE, a game of time and temperature
blurb: A fun, educational game about Earth ~and climate. The conversation is lively, global, colorful and relevant. For ages 8 and up.

rewards.reward: Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet as a "Friend of Imagination."
Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet as a \u201cFriend of Imagination\u201d.  A packet of wildflower seeds in the mail (if you'd like).

Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and the polareclipsegame.com site as a \u201cFriend of Education\u201d,  and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with a mini bio.  An espresso shot of gratitude for your help.

A copy of the first edition of Polar Eclipse\u2122 Game (shipping not included with this pledge), credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet as a "Friend of Biodiversity." A frogs croak of gratitude for your help.

A signed copy of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122 Game, Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet as a \u201cFriend of Education\u201d.  A fresh, ripe peach of gratitude for your help.

A signed copy of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122 Game, Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and on the site as a \u201cFriend of Biodiversity\u201d  and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with a mini bio.  The queen bees gratitude for your help.

(A Gift for a School) Two signed copies of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122 Game, one for you and one given to a school with your note inside the package. You pick the school or we will. Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and on the site as a \u201cFriend of the Earth,\u201d  and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with a mini bio.  A raging river of gratitude for your help.

(A Gift for a friend) Two signed copies of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122 Game, Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and on the site as a \u201cFriend of the Earth\u201d and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with any kind of bio.  (except naked, sorry).  An ocean of gratitude for your help, with no trash.  A special gift from Bali, Indonesia.

(Your choice) Five signed copies of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122 game.\r\nChoose from a list of schools, give them as gifts, keep one for the kids, maybe, give them to your local schools.... or keep one game and I\u2019ll put the money into hiring an a programmer to build an app. so more people will be paying attention to climate and ecological issues. Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and on the site as a \u201cFriend of Ecological Literacy\u201d  and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with a bio.  A mountain of gratitude for your help and a special handmade gift from Bali, Indonesia.

Up to five signed copies of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122(If you can use them).  A two day,  and two night adventure in the red rock canyons of Utah, hiking or canyoneering, your choice . You get to Southern Utah and we\u2019ll handle the rest. Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and on the site as a \u201cFriend of Adventure\u201d  and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with a bio.  A night sky of gratitude for your help and a special handmade gift from Bali, Indonesia.

Up to five signed copies of the first edition of the Polar Eclipse \u2122(If you can use them).  A two day,  and two night skiing holiday in Utah.  You get to Park City and we\u2019ll handle the rest.  Credit in the Polar Eclipse\u2122 Rules and Reference booklet and on the site as a \u201cFriend of Change\u201d  and a link to your site added (if you\u2019d like) with a bio.  A slow moving glacier of gratitude for your help and a very special handmade gift from Bali, Indonesia.
